This creb package is downloaded from http://zwizwa.be/darcs/creb using "darcs get http://zwizwa.be/darcs/creb", build, packaged and uploaded to http://puredata.info/Members/fjkraan/software/ at 2016-01-08. 

Apart from this file and the source package creb_source.tgz all files and directories are the result of the make install command.

The used build platforms are:
- Xubuntu X86_64 14.04 LTS on an Intel i3 CPU,
- Xubuntu i686_32 14.04 LTS on an Intel i3 CPU,
- MacOSX 10.5 Leopard compiling for i386-32, X86_64-32, ppc-32 on an Intel Core Duo, 
- Raspian Wheezy (2015-05-05) on a Raspberry Pi 2 Model B.

fjkraan@xs4all.nl, 2016-01-08
